thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: MARK & CHERRY WILLIAMS
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by MARK & CHERRY WILLIAMS

author: MARK & CHERRY WILLIAMS
title: MARK & CHERRY WILLIAMS
text: We recently were on honeymoon in Australia and used Redspot for our rental car. We had no issues or concerns with this company nor the car and found them awesome to deal with. We would not hesitate to use them again and will be doing so next year on our return holiday to Aussie.
